title: Gemini Rain
description: This book is no longer available.Lauren Maguire Connolly, successful entrepreneur and young widow runs away from Ireland for a new life and family values in France.David Corvassier, famous actor leaves his very public life in Paris for his old family life in Marseille.Paul Morris, Irish politician just wants his life back to normal; career he finds doesn’t always mean contentment.But ghosts are rearing their ugly heads. Lauren finds that not all in her family life can be new if phantoms regarding the circumstances of her husband’s death keep pulling her back to Ireland, risking the life she has slowly rebuilt with her two young children.David watches as his old family values and the relationship he’s building with Lauren are lost as his acting career keeps dragging him back to his old ways, or as the gossip columns like to imagine are his old habits.Paul just needs two important people in his life to work with him so the path he has chosen can stay on a smooth track.Can these three Gemini work together to help close each individual’s problems? Or will those ghosts win and forever rule their lives….pop inside and enjoy their journey….
author: L.J. McEvoy
